article.headline: Joe Biden tests negative for COVID-19, doctor says
article.body: Democratic presidential nominee Joe Biden and his wife, Jill Biden, tested negative for COVID-19 on Friday, according a statement from their physician, Dr. Kevin O'Connor, that was released by Biden's campaign. Biden and President Donald Trump were together on Tuesday night for their first debate. Trump said early Friday that he had tested positive for the disease caused by the coronavirus.
